name: NPR
text:
Jon Batiste's fingers playing the piano were animated for Pixar's new film.

"I was almost in tears, because you see your essence and you think: Wow, this is the first Black Pixar lead and we're putting jazz culture out there in this massive way."
https://t.co/zIs2tIBR9G

name: NPR
text:
Pope Francis: "I ask everyone — government leaders, businesses, international organizations — to foster cooperation and not competition, and to seek a solution for everyone: vaccines for all, especially for the most vulnerable and needy."
https://t.co/SO72oDVado
